channel.title: CVE Feed for GE -- UR bootloader binary
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GE -- UR bootloader binary

item.title: CVE-2021-27430|2024-08-03T20:48:17.186Z -- ge -- ur%20bootloader%20binary
item.description: GE UR bootloader binary Version 7.00, 7.01 and 7.02 included unused hardcoded credentials. Additionally, a user with physical access to the UR IED can interrupt the boot sequence by rebooting the UR.
